{ "repository": "https://github.com/leanprover/lean4", "description": "Lean 4 is a statically typed, dependently typed functional programming language with support for type theory, proof assistants, and formal verification.", "main_topics": ["Theorem Proving", "Functional Programming Features"],

"key_features": [
"Type Theory",
"Dependent Types",
"Proof Assistants",
"Formal Verification",
"Higher-Order Functions",
"Closures",
"Pattern Matching",
"Recursion Schemes",
"Lazy Evaluation"
], "use_cases": [
"Formal verification of software and hardware systems",
"Theorem proving for mathematics",
"Type theory research",
"Proof assistants for dependent types",
"Education and research in formal verification and type theory"

]}
